title: Mister Parker’s Cul-de-sac
description: Mister Parker teaches children about friendship and navigating the tough parts of life as a kid. Join him and his friends on his street that ends in a circle.
quote: The thing about circles is they never end, so our friendship will be universal.
altHero: Mr. Parker, a jovial man in a suit, entering a house through the green front door
alt1: Mr. Parker puts on a red sweater
alt2: Mr. Parker lounging on the couch and opening a beer
alt3: a sun with a smiling human face
alt4: two female puppets talk to each other
